#
sysname Spoke1
# 
nhrp enable
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0
 ip address 10.1.2.10 255.255.255.0
 binding tunnel gre
# 
interface LoopBack0
 ip address 192.168.1.1 255.255.255.255
# 
interface Tunnel0
 ip address 172.16.1.2 255.255.255.0
 tunnel-protocol gre p2mp
 source GigabitEthernet1/0/0
 ospf network-type p2mp
 nhrp enable
 nhrp shortcut
 nhrp entry 172.16.1.1 10.1.1.10 register
# 
ospf 1 router-id 172.16.1.2
 area 0.0.0.0
  network 172.16.1.0 0.0.0.255
  network 192.168.1.0 0.0.0.255
# 
ospf 2 router-id 10.1.2.10
 area 0.0.0.1
  network 10.1.2.0 0.0.0.255
# 
return

hostname Spoke1

 tunnel source Loopback0

interface Loopback0
 ip address 192.168.1.1 255.255.255.255

interface Tunnel0

 tunnel protection ipsec profile <IPSEC_PROFILE_NAME>

cisco:
hostname PE2
!
router ospf 1
 router-id 4.4.4.4
 network 4.4.4.4 0.0.0.0 area 0
 network 10.10.3.0 0.0.0.255 area 0
!
mpls ldp router-id 4.4.4.4
!
mpls label protocol ldp
!
mpls l2vpn
!
vfi v1
 vpn id 1
 rd 10.10.3.4:1
 route-target export 100:1
 route-target import 100:1
!
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0.1
 encapsulation dot1Q 10
 xconnect vfi v1
!
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0
 no shutdown
 ip address 10.10.3.4 255.255.255.0
 mpls ip
 mpls ldp autoconfig
!
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0.1
 encapsulation dot1Q 10
 xconnect vfi v1
!
interface Loopback1
 ip address 4.4.4.4 255.255.255.255
!
router bgp 200
 bgp router-id 4.4.4.4
 neighbor 3.3.3.3 remote-as 200
 neighbor 3.3.3.3 update-source Loopback1
 !
 address-family l2vpn evpn
  neighbor 3.3.3.3 activate
  advertise-all-vni
  advertise ipv4 unicast
  advertise ipv6 unicast
 !
 !
 address-family vpnv4
  neighbor 3.3.3.3 activate
  neighbor 3.3.3.3 send-community extended
 !
!
mpls traffic-eng tunnels
!
mpls traffic-eng tunnel-path-mtu-discovery
!
mpls traffic-eng load-balancing number 1
!
mpls traffic-eng tunnel-select bgp ldp
!
end

encapsulation dot1q 1

encapsulation dot1q 1

bridge-domain 1

network 2.2.2.2 0.0.0.0 area 0

evpn
source-interface Loopback0

maintenance-domain md1

#
sysname PE2
#
evpn vpn-instance evrf1 vpws

 local-remote frr enable

#

 evpn binding vpn-instance evrf1
 local-service-id 100 remote-service-id 200
#
mpls lsr-id 2.2.2.2
#               
mpls
#
mpls ldp
#

 undo shutdown
 esi 0001.0002.0003.0004.0005 
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0.1 mode l2
 encapsulation dot1q vid 1
 evpl instance 1
#
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ip address 10.2.1.1 255.255.255.0
 mpls
 mpls ldp
#
interface LoopBack1
 ip address 2.2.2.2 255.255.255.255
#
bgp 100
 peer 3.3.3.3 as-number 100
 peer 3.3.3.3 connect-interface LoopBack1
 #
 ipv4-family unicast
  undo synchronization
  peer 3.3.3.3 enable
 #
 l2vpn-family evpn
  undo policy vpn-target
  peer 3.3.3.3 enable
#
ospf 1
 area 0.0.0.0
  network 2.2.2.2 0.0.0.0
  network 10.2.1.0 0.0.0.255
#
evpn source-address 2.2.2.2
#
return

hostname PE2
#
vrf definition evrf1
 rd 100:2
 !
 address-family ipv4
  route-target export 1:1
  route-target import 1:1
 exit-address-family
!
mpls ldp router-id Loopback1 force
!
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0
 no shutdown
 ethernet segment 1
  esi 0001.0002.0003.0004.0005 
!
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0.1
 encapsulation dot1Q 1
 xconnect vfi evpl1
!
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0
 no shutdown
 ip address 10.2.1.1 255.255.255.0
 mpls ip
 mpls ldp
!
interface Loopback1
 ip address 2.2.2.2 255.255.255.255
!
router bgp 100
 neighbor 3.3.3.3 remote-as 100
 neighbor 3.3.3.3 update-source Loopback1
 !
 address-family ipv4
  no synchronization
  neighbor 3.3.3.3 activate
 exit-address-family
 !
 address-family l2vpn evpn
  neighbor 3.3.3.3 activate
 exit-address-family
!
router ospf 1
 network 2.2.2.2 0.0.0.0 area 0
 network 10.2.1.0 0.0.0.255 area 0
!
evpn
 source-interface Loopback1
!
end

#
sysname RSG
#
ip vpn-instance a
 ipv4-family
  route-distinguisher 1:1
  apply-label per-instance
  vpn-target 1:1 export-extcommunity
  vpn-target 1:1 import-extcommunity
#
mpls lsr-id 10.5.2.9
#
mpls
 label advertise non-null
#
mpls ldp
 graceful-restart
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/2
 undo shutdown
 ip address 10.7.0.2 255.255.255.252
 mpls
 mpls ldp
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/4
 undo shutdown
 ip address 10.8.0.2 255.255.255.252
 mpls
 mpls ldp
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/5
 undo shutdown
 ip binding vpn-instance a
 ip address 10.20.0.2 255.255.255.252
#
interface LoopBack0
 ip address 10.5.2.9 255.255.255.255
#
bgp 100
 peer 10.3.2.9 as-number 100
 peer 10.3.2.9 connect-interface LoopBack0
 peer 10.4.2.9 as-number 100
 peer 10.4.2.9 connect-interface LoopBack0
 #
 ipv4-family unicast
  import-route direct
  peer 10.3.2.9 enable
  peer 10.4.2.9 enable
 #
 ipv4-family vpnv4
  policy vpn-target
  peer 10.3.2.9 enable
  peer 10.4.2.9 enable
 #
 ipv4-family vpn-instance a
  import-route direct
  peer 10.20.0.1 as-number 500
#
ospf 1 router-id 10.5.2.9
 opaque-capability enable
 graceful-restart
 area 0.0.0.0
  network 10.5.2.9 0.0.0.0
  network 10.7.0.0 0.0.0.255
  network 10.8.0.0 0.0.0.255
#
return
